name: Lillian RATARSKY, v. Appellant, Jack RATARSKY

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
McDERMOTT, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Lillian RATARSKY, v. Appellant, Jack RATARSKY.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
McDERMOTT, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
LARSEN and CAPPY, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Jackson M. Sigmon, William P. Exaros, Bethlehem, for appellant.
Gerald I. Roth, Allentown, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
581 A.2d 1377
Lillian RATARSKY, v. Appellant, Jack RATARSKY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 23, 1990.
Decided Nov. 9, 1990.
Jackson M. Sigmon, William P. Exaros, Bethlehem, for appellant.
Gerald I. Roth, Allentown, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
